remarks:
Extensionality principle for ordered triples (used by 2-place operations ~ df-oprab ), analogous to ~ eqrel .  Use ~ relrelss to express the antecedent in terms of the relation predicate.  (Contributed by NM, 17-Dec-2008.)

statement:
eqrelrel $p |- ( ( A u. B ) C_ ( ( _V X. _V ) X. _V ) -> ( A = B <-> A. x A. y A. z ( <. <. x , y >. , z >. e. A <-> <. <. x , y >. , z >. e. B ) ) ) $.
$d A x y z $.
